title: Quote Generator
author: WolfPTL

footer.copyright: WolfPTL's Quote Generator. All rights reserved.

slogan: Generate a Random Quote with a Random Background for Free!

instructions.1: Step 1: Choose Your Settings and Press 'Generate'
instructions.2: Step 2: View Your Quote Image Here (it may take a while...)
instructions.3: Step 3: Press 'Download' to Get Your Image

toast.success: Your image is ready for download!
toast.fail: Sorry. There is an error generating your image! Please try again or contact the website creator.

notFound.p: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

features.1-1: Create and share your own meaningful quotes with our easy-to-use editor.
features.2-1: Enjoy a vast range of images from tranquil to adventurous, with each new quote coming to life against a fresh, unique background.
features.3-1: Download your generated quotes instantly with just a click in high quality format.
